Params: {2: 'Lucia', 3: "We've run into mechanoids that weren't labeled red or blue, but they couldn't understand us.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'This is an interesting turn of events. Maybe they can tell us a thing or two.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "What's your name? Did you or someone give you a name?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'I think I ran across this name while reading a document in Babylonia.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "I think I've heard of this myth as well... Isn't it the brother of two siblings carved out of wood by the gods?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "If I remember correctly... the girl's name is Embla?", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Just like the "defect" we saw. Seems like they have at least some degree of cognition.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Are you referring to those "red" and "blue" mechanoids?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The mechanoid raises its hand and points at Lee and Lucia, bringing a previously relaxed situation back into confrontation.'}
{3: 'Lucia gestures to the mechanoid to calm down.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "That may be true, but we're not hostile like those mechanoids.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'The people in blue and pink and the person behind me are my "comrades."', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The mechanoid steps forward while still shielding the figure behind it.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Don\'t worry. We won\'t harm you or your "comrade."', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lee looks toward the small figure hiding behind the larger mechanoid.'}
{2: 'Askr', 3: '"War." Many times. Many remains. Different remains. Askr and Embla. Hide here. And live.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Askr', 3: 'Red. Blue. No color. We live. Like this.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Lucia and Lee look at you as if debating whether to tell the mechanoid where you are from.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Yes, we... we are from the "outside world."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Askr', 3: '"Knowledge" is. Naraka. Beings. Must know. Do know.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "We aren't getting too many explanations, just more and more questions waiting to be answered.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Askr', 3: 'Only way. Is. Push everything. Past breaking point. I can. Wake "Father".', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Askr', 3: 'Our. Pain. Our. Suffering. Make Father. See.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'The mechanoids think... this "Father" won\'t ignore their suffering...?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Looks like this "Father" plays a key role.', 3: '131'}
{2: 'Perhaps we can uncover the truth behind this facility.', 3: '135'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'We want to help you awaken the "Father" you speak of.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'We have something to ask him.', 3: '142', 4: 'Because we also care about "Father"...', 5: '145'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'That is, if he, or she, is willing to answer us.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Askr points to a nearly indiscernible wound on Embla.'}
{3: 'â€”You notice an indentation. The outer metal layer was cracked with black lubricant seeping out of it.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Understood. You want us to help you find parts so you can repair it?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Askr remains quiet as if his language module cannot find an appropriate response.'}
{3: 'But after a period of silence, he nods with his spherical head and upper body slightly.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'No problem. We came here on a mission, but our duty as soldiers is to help those in need.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "I'd be... more than happy to help others...", 4: '3'}
